TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckedListBox/CheckedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 封裝 中已選取項目 (包括不定狀態中的項目) 的索引集合。

span.span: Encapsulates the collection of indexes of checked items (including items in an indeterminate state) in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已檢查的索引集合是索引中的所有項目集合內的子集控制項。The checked indexes collection is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 這些索引指定中已核取或是不定狀態的項目。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. 下表是控制項 （控制項中包含的所有項目） 中項目的索引集合的範例。The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|項目Item|核取狀態Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|object 1object 1|| |11|物件 2object 2|| |22|物件 3object 3|| |33|物件 4object 4|| |44|物件 5object 5|| 根據上一個範例下, 表顯示索引的選取項目的索引集合。Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |索引Index|項目的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 類別有兩個成員，可讓您存取預存的索引，屬性和方法。The class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the property and the method. 根據上述範例中，呼叫屬性值為 1 的參數與傳回值為 3。Based on the previous example, a call to the property with a parameter value of 1 returns a value of 3. 呼叫3 的參數與傳回值為 1。A call to with a parameter of 3 returns a value of 1. ## Examples 下列範例會列舉中的選取項目查看項目檢查狀態項目為。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 此範例示範如何使用方法，以設定項目的核取狀態。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 此範例也示範如何使用屬性來取得，而屬性來取得。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一個迴圈會使用方法來取得的每個選取的項目，給定項目的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二個迴圈也會使用，但是會使用方法來擷取項目的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 將整個集合複製到現有陣列中的指定位置。

span.span: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來結合成單一陣列的多個集合從選取的索引。You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.

is multidimensional.
is less than zero.

span.span: The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 來源 的類型無法自動轉換成目的 的類型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

Public Function IndexOf (index As Integer) As Integer

span.span: The index of the checked item.

summary.span: 傳回已選取索引集合內的索引。

span.span: Returns an index into the collection of checked indexes.

returns.span: 索引，其指定已選取項目的索引；如果 參數不在已選取的索引集合中，則為 –1。

span.span: The index that specifies the index of the checked item or -1 if the parameter is not in the checked indexes collection.

returns.span: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別概觀中的範例。

span.span: For more information, see the examples in the class overview.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index`參數則是項目集合中的核取項目的索引。The `index` parameter is the index of a checked item in the items collection. 傳回值是已檢查的索引集合的對應索引。The return value is the corresponding index into the checked indexes collection.
